Comment.Language: For the Commemoration of St. Karas:

Text.Language: Peniwt eyouab abba Karac: afswpi hi p~safe: hi pitebisasf (n#z#) n~rompi: hi p~ho a~nau n~rompi.
Our holy father Abba KarasÂ / lived in the wildernessÂ / for 57 years,Â / not seeing the face of a man.
